select a.commodity_id commodityId, a.commodity_name commodityName, a.cost_price costPrice, a.sell_price sellPrice, a.sold_number soldNumber, a.parent_code parentCode, a.systematic_code systematicCode, a.message message, a.introduce introduction, a.up_downstate upDownstate, a.data_issued dataIssued, a.page_view pageView, a.stone_id stoneId, a.stone_name stoneName, a.repertory repertory, b.path path, a.version from t_commodity a, t_file b
a.is_delete = 0 and a.commodity_id = #{commodityId} and b.biz_id = #{commodityId}

select a.commodity_id commodityId, a.commodity_name commodityName, a.cost_price cost_Price, a.sell_price sell_Price, a.sold_number soldNumber, b.parent_name parentName, b.systematic_name systematicName, a.message, a.introduce, a.up_downstate upDownstate, a.data_issued dataIssued, a.page_view pageView, a.stone_name stoneName, a.repertory, a.commodity_nunmer commodityNunmer, a.version from t_commodity a left join t_commodity_classification b on b.systematic_code = a.systematic_code where a.is_delete = 0
and a.commodity_name like concat('%', #{commodityName}, '%')
and a.up_downstate like concat('%',#{upDownstate},'%')
and a.message like concat('%',#{message},'%')
and a.author like concat('%',#{author},'%')
and a.press like concat('%',#{press},'%')
order by a.create_user desc
